summary: Adds an interior named "Ultra Mine" that allows you to obtain ores from different veins.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds an interior named "Ultra Mine" that allows you to obtain ores from nine different veins (only deplete after 100 million strikes). All the veins in the vanilla game were included. Note that Geode Vein gives ebony ore and soul gem (10% chance).

There is a spell tome which teaches you a Lesser Power that teleport to the place (craft at Tanning Rack using 1 Grand Soul Gem and 1 Goat Hide).

Requires latest version of Skyrim.

Note:
Should be compatible with most of the mods, but there might be some bugs that I didn't aware of, so remember to backup your save file before using this mod. Also leave a comment if you encounter any bug.
  
For those update from version 1.4 (or earlier):
Disable the mod - Load game -  Save game - Overwrite the files - Activate mod

Resources Used:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19066/?]HoddminirGroundTextures[/url]

Tools Used:
[url=http://www.creationkit.com/Main_Page]Creation Kit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]
author: zenghis
